title: "2 A.M. in the Subway" (1905) cinematographer Billy Bitzer

sources.title: "2 A.M. in the Subway" (1905) cinematographer Billy Bitzer
sources.description: This gem is presented by Silent Hall of Fame.   Please visit https://silent-hall-of-fame.org/   to support our non-profit mission and the legacy of silent movie stars by making a tax deductible contribution.   FEEL FREE TO FOLLOW US ON TWITTER @SilentFilmGems   "2 A.M. in the Subway" is a very short comedy. The film is included in our program to illustrate the work of Billy Bitzer, a star of Silent Hall of Fame. Directed by                       unknown Cinematography by         Billy Bitzer Starring                             unknown Distributed by                   Biograph Company Release date                       June 20, 1905 Country                             United States Running time                    1 m.
